description: What actually is a "regular guy"? I am sorry for asking but I am not a native speaker. Is it the "guy next door"? Well, if it is the "guy next door" than I today met a "regular guy" par excellence. He looked good - though he wasn´t a beauty. He had that charm of innocence and believe. And he believed that I could help him out of his debts. Well I certainly could. But I always insist to get my part of the fun. I want them to strip. to dance, to show their body and to totally submit for an hour. He agreed to that. And he had to do a lot of more things. It became my way of discovering a boy´s body. But then I want more. I want his kiss, his mouth, his hole, his everything.
title: Debt Dandy 14
